summary: After several people and a dog are found dead in their closets, a mild-mannered reporter, a college professor, her son, and a befuddled professor band together to uncover the mystery.
cast: Donald Grant|Denise DuBarry|Claude Akins|Howard Duff|Henry Gibson|Donald Moffat|Paul Dooley|John Carradine|Jesse White|Frank Ashmore|Paul Walker|Stella Stevens|Kevin Peter Hall|Fergie|Ritchie Montgomery|Arthur Berggren|Daryle Ann Lindley|Gordon Metcalfe|David Anthony|Annie Glynn|Arlee Reed|James Arone|Andrew Cofrin|Benny Baker|Doc Duhame|Jonna Lee|Arthur Taxier|Archie Lang|Clare Torao|John Walsh|Wycliffe Young|Paul Latchaw|David McCharen|Patricia Richarde|Carole Kean|Jack Tate|Sheldon Feldner|Terrence Beasor|Katherine Lyons|Jack Shearer|Richie Egan|Jonathan Aluzas|Brad Kesten|Evan Arnold|Corky Pigeon|Stephanie White|Kenneth Kessler|William Kirksey|Kathleen McGrath|Paul McIsaac|Patrice Messina|Eric A. Peterson|John Michael Quinn|Mary-Margaret Stratton
title: El monstruo del armario
